attributes.action: To get The Ellen Degeneres Show Aired here in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
#GetElleyOnTheTelly

http://youtu.be/bPy16ihz0jc James Cordon Sings about the UK Not having Ellen Degeneres Show here.
attributes.background: The Ellen Degeneres Show has recently aired its 2000th Show in the States, The Ellen Show is currently aired in a number of countries Including Australia, and Some parts on the EU.. But no here. Even if the BBC, ITV, Channel 4, or Channel 5 Brought it it wouldn't go a miss theres a ton of supporters

rejection.details: This isn't something that the Government or Parliament could do. You could write to the broadcasters directly to make this suggestion.
